entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
